info.description:
Click and drag the image to pan. Use the slider to zoom.
in Buf B uncomment BIGNUM_FIXED_POINT_UNSIGNED_64 to allow slightly deeper zooming when things go blocky (slow - reduce Blks to do less per frame).
Maybe I'll implement U64 subtract and sqr one day.
